title: You And I
lyrics: No matter what happens Even when the sky is falling down I'll promise you That I'll never let you go You naega sseureojil ttae Jeoldae heundeullimeop si ganghan nunbicheuro Myeotbeo nigo nal ireukyeojweo And you, na himae gyeoul ttae Seulpeumeul byeolang kkeutkkaji tto eogimeopsi Chajawa du son japeun geudaeyegae Nan haejungae eopneun dae Chorahan naji man Oneul geudae wihae I norae bulleoyo Tonight geudaeye du nu nae Geu miso dwiae nalwihae gamchweowatdeon A peumiboyeoyo You and I together It just feels so right Ibyeol liran mareun never Geu nuga mweora haedo nan geudael jikilgae You and I together Nae du soneul nojima Annyoung giran mareun never Naegae I saesangeun ojik neowa nagie You maneun sarangcheo reom Uri sarang yeokshi jogeumssik byunhagaetjyo Haji man jaebal seulpeo malayo Oh raen chinhan chingu cheo reom Namaneul mideul suitgae gidaelsuitgae I promise you that I'll be right here, baby Nan haejungae eopneun dae Chorahan naji man Oneul geudae wihae I norae bulleoyo Tonight geudaeye du nu nae Geu miso dwiae nalwihae gamchweowatdeon A peumiboyeoyo You and I together It just feels so right Ibyeol liran mareun never Geu nuga mweora haedo nan geudael jikilgae You and I together Nae du soneul nojima Annyoung giran mareun never Naegae I saesangeun ojik neowa nagie Oeroun bami chajaol ttaen Na salmyeosi nuneul gamayo Geudaeye sumgyeoli nal aneulddae Mueotdo duryeopji an jyo I saesang geu eoddeon nugu do Geudaereul daeshin halsueop jyo I'll be there for you, baby You and I together It just feels so right Ibyeol liran mareun never Geu nuga mweora haedo nan geudael jikilgae You and I together Nae du soneul nojima Annyoung giran mareun never Naegae I saesangeun ojik neowa nagie
